## CalibrationQRCodesConfig.outerMargin property

Horizontal (and vertical) margin in pixels between the left (or the top) of the image and the left (or the top) of the first QR code. Defaults to 10.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
outerMargin?: number;
```
